channel.title: The Fish in the Sea is Not Thirsty on Osho - The complete works of Osho
channel.description: Recent content in The Fish in the Sea is Not Thirsty on Osho - The complete works of Osho

image.title: Osho - The complete works of Osho

item.title: Chapter title: An Alive Buddhafield
item.description: < Previous | Contents | Next > ‌Chapter title: An Alive Buddhafield‌ 15 April 1979 am in Buddha Hall Archive code: 7904150 ShortTitle: FISH05 Audio: Yes Video: No Length: 99 mins The first question Question 1 OSHO, I AM HERE ONLY FOR A VERY SHORT VISIT. I HAVE COME TO TRY TO UNDERSTAND WHAT YOU HAVE HERE THAT THE REST OF THE WORLD DOES NOT. CAN YOU HELP ME? Mrs. Ward,

item.title: Chapter title: But Man Is
item.description: < Previous | Contents | Next > ‌Chapter title: But Man Is‌ 11 April 1979 am in Buddha Hall Archive code: 7904110 ShortTitle: FISH01 Audio: Yes Video: No Length: 106 mins I LAUGH WHEN I HEAR THAT THE FISH IN THE WATER IS THIRSTY. YOU DON'T GRASP THE FACT THAT WHAT IS MOST ALIVE OF ALL IS INSIDE YOUR OWN HOUSE; AND SO YOU WALK FROM ONE HOLY CITY TO THE NEXT WITH A CONFUSED LOOK!

item.title: Chapter title: Life is a Lovesong
item.description: < Previous | Contents ‌Chapter title: Life is a Lovesong‌ 24 April 1979 am in Buddha Hall Archive code: 7904240 ShortTitle: FISH14 Audio: Yes Video: No Length: 102 mins The first question Question 1 OSHO, I KEEP THINKING OF MY LIFE IN TERMS OF GOAL OR DESTINATION, WAITING TO WAKE UP SOME DAY AND FIND MYSELF ENLIGHTENED, AND I WORRY THAT OTHERS WILL REACH BEFORE ME. TODAY IS A TENSION.

item.title: Chapter title: Untimely Sannyasination
item.description: < Previous | Contents | Next > ‌Chapter title: Untimely Sannyasination‌ 16 April 1979 am in Buddha Hall Archive code: 7904160 ShortTitle: FISH06 Audio: Yes Video: No Length: 107 mins The first question Question 1 OSHO, HOW CAN REBELLION BE RECEPTIVE, FEMININE, YES- SAYING? IT FEELS SO MUCH LIKE A NO TO ALL THESE OLD THINGS. IS IT JUST AWARENESS AND LOVE THAT IS IT? Prem Mariam, REVOLUTION IS NO, REBELLION IS YES.
